title: Ruins of Temptation
description: I’ve spent years trying to be someone I’m not.Controlled and humanized.Still, the darkness lurks inside me, waiting for a chance to break free.As the headmaster at Corium University, I must maintain professionalism and keep myself in check.I manage to do that until the day I discover I have a daughter and all the carefully constructed walls I’ve built around myself start to crumble.I know I need an outlet, a way to shut it off, and then she lands in my lap.Delilah.I want to punish her, humiliate her, and hurt her in the best ways.It’s nothing but a cat and mouse game till I discover the secrets she’s hiding…
author: C. Hallman
